title: Adi Shankar's INSANE New Netflix Project - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 181)
description:
Go to http://babbel.com and use promo code MORNING
to get an additional 3 months FREE when you purchase a 3-month Babbel subscription.

Go to http://overland.com/kindafunny to get free shipping and free returns on the highest-quality sheepskin slippers on the market.

Go to http://buyraycon.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your Raycon order.

The incomparable Adi Shankar returns to the Kinda Funny Podcast to talk all about his new Netflix Project Guardians of Justice, his Where's Waldo movie pitch, and gets real about mental health.

Follow Adi at https://twitter.com/adishankarbrand

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Adi Shankar house tour
00:10:20 - The Guardians of Justice
00:20:00 - Mental Health and movies
00:44:13 - Where's Waldo
00:46:56 - Magic School Bus Pitch
